Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 包含一些属性，这些属性用于约束 调用所返回 对象的集合。

span.span: Contains properties that are used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 一个包含属性的 ，这些属性用于约束 方法依据 所使用数据库中的跟踪数据返回的 对象的集合。A contains properties that are used to constrain the set of objects returned by the method against the tracking data in a database used by the . 由 调用返回的 对象集合中的每个 都必须与一个工作流实例对应，该工作流实例在数据库中具有与之关联的跟踪数据（满足 的属性指定的条件）。Each in the collection of objects returned by a call to must correspond to a workflow instance which has tracking data associated with it in the database that meets the conditions specified by the properties of the .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示 类的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||。.| ||。.| ||一个空 。An empty .| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| 这些值指定 调用应为在数据库中具有跟踪数据的每个工作流实例返回 对象。These values specify that a call to should return a object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 类的实例。The following example demonstrates creating an instance of the class. 此示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例。This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流监视器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示 类的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||。.| ||。.| ||一个空 。An empty .| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| 这些值指定 调用应为在数据库中具有跟踪数据的每个工作流实例返回 对象。These values specify that a call to should return a object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime StatusMaxDateTime { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指定时段上限的 ，可以将其与 结合使用来约束 调用所返回 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a that specifies the upper limit of the time period that, together with , is used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

value.span: 一个 ，它指定用于匹配工作流实例（带有由 指定的状态）的时段的上限。

span.span: A that specifies the upper limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 约束由 调用返回到这些工作流实例的 对象的集合，这些工作流实例具有由 指定的 ，具有由 在 和 所指定期间指定的状态，并具有至少与一个 所指定 对象匹配的已提取数据。 constrains the set of objects returned by a call to to those workflow instances that have the specified by , that have the status specified by during the period specified by and , and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the objects specified by . 由 指定的 值包含在内。The value specified by is inclusive. 有关如何匹配工作流实例的状态的更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `WorkflowStatus` 设置为 Null，则会忽略 `StatusMaxDateTime` 和 `StatusMinDateTime`。If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored. 调用 `GetWorkflows` 时将返回所有工作流实例。All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 StatusMaxDateTime 属性。The following example demonstrates setting the StatusMaxDateTime property. 此示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例。This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流监视器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#128](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#128)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime StatusMinDateTime { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，可将其与 结合使用来约束 调用所返回 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a that, together with , is used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

value.span: 一个 ，它指定用于匹配工作流实例（带有由 指定的状态）的时段的下限。

span.span: A that specifies the lower limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 约束由 调用返回到这些工作流实例的 对象的集合，这些工作流实例具有由 指定的 ，具有由 在 和 所指定期间指定的状态，并具有至少与一个 所指定 对象匹配的已提取数据。 constrains the set of objects returned by a call to to those workflow instances that have the specified by , that have the status specified by during the period specified by and , and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the objects specified by . 由 指定的 值包含在内。The value specified by is inclusive. 有关如何匹配工作流实例的状态的更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `WorkflowStatus` 设置为 Null，则会忽略 `StatusMaxDateTime` 和 `StatusMinDateTime`。If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored. 调用 `GetWorkflows` 时将返回所有工作流实例。All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 StatusMinDateTime 属性。The following example demonstrates setting the StatusMinDateTime property. 此示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例。This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流监视器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#128](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#128)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TrackingDataItems As IList(Of TrackingDataItemValue)

summary.span: 获取或设置一个数据提取值的列表，这些值用于约束 调用所返回 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of data extract values which are used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

value.span: 对象的一个 ，它包含要为从工作流实例或空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）中所提取数据匹配的指定值。

span.span: A of objects that contains specified values to be matched for data extracted from the workflow instance or a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 约束由 调用返回到这些工作流实例的 对象的集合，这些工作流实例具有由 指定的 ，具有由 在 和 所指定期间指定的状态，并具有至少与一个 所指定 对象匹配的已提取数据。 constrains the set of objects returned by a call to to those workflow instances that have the specified by , that have the status specified by during the period specified by and , and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the objects specified by . 或 可以包含 记录，这些记录包含从工作流中提取的数据。 or can contain records that contain data that is extracted from the workflow. 属性包含 对象，这些对象指定此提取数据的某些值。The property contains objects that specify certain values for this extracted data. 如果工作流实例满足 指定的其他条件，并且 不是空引用 (`Nothing`)，则存储在工作流实例数据库中的已提取数据必须与一个或多个已提取数据值（由要为工作流实例返回的 对象的 属性指定）相匹配。If the workflow instance meets the other criteria specified by and is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the extracted data stored in the database for a workflow instance must match one or more of the extracted data values specified by the property for a object to be returned for the workflow instance. 如果 为空引用 (`Nothing`)，则对于数据库中的任何工作流实例，所返回 对象的集合将不受已提取数据的值的约束。If is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of objects returned will not be constrained by the values of the extracted data for any of the workflow instances in the database.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property WorkflowStatus As Nullable(Of WorkflowStatus)

public: property Nullable<System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus> WorkflowStatus { Nullable<System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值用于约束 调用所返回 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that is used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

value.span: 值之一，或为 Null（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: One of the values or null ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 约束由 调用返回到这些工作流实例的 对象的集合，这些工作流实例具有由 指定的 ，具有由 在 和 所指定期间指定的状态，并具有至少与一个 所指定 对象匹配的已提取数据。 constrains the set of objects returned by a call to to those workflow instances that have the specified by , that have the status specified by during the period specified by and , and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the objects specified by . 如果在指定时段之前或指定时段中为某个工作流实例收到的最后一个 的 属性设置为 值（该值映射到 指定的 值），则认为该工作流实例具有与 匹配的状态。A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches if the last received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its property set to a value that maps to the value specified by . 因此，工作流实例的 必须具有为相应的 值配置的 。Therefore, the for the workflow instance must have a that is configured for the appropriate value. 只能匹配已在工作流跟踪记录中发送的 值。Only values that have been sent in workflow tracking records can be matched. 如果尚未为工作流实例发送任何工作流跟踪记录，则该工作流实例被认为具有状态 。If no workflow tracking records have been sent for the workflow instance, the workflow instance is considered to have a status of . 下表显示了 值和 值之间的映射。The following table shows the mapping between values and values. |TrackingWorkflowEvent 值TrackingWorkflowEvent value|WorkflowStatus 值WorkflowStatus value| |---------------------------------|--------------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| 如果 为 Null (`Nothing`)，则返回的 对象将不受状态约束；换句话说，将会为与 的其他属性指定的参数匹配的任何工作流实例返回 对象。If is null (`Nothing`), the set of objects returned will not be constrained by status; in other words, a object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 WorkflowStatus 属性。The following example demonstrates setting the WorkflowStatus property. 此示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例。This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流监视器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#128](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#128)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ WorkflowType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置工作流实例 ，它用于约束 调用所返回 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the workflow instance that is used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

value.span: 默认为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The default is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 约束由 调用返回到这些工作流实例的 对象的集合，这些工作流实例具有由 指定的 ，具有由 在 和 所指定期间指定的状态，并具有至少与一个 所指定 对象匹配的已提取数据。 constrains the set of objects returned by a call to to those workflow instances that have the specified by , that have the status specified by during the period specified by and , and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the objects specified by . 如果 为空引用 (`Nothing`)，则返回的 对象的集合将不受工作流 约束；换句话说，将为与 的其他属性所指定参数匹配的任何工作流实例返回 对象。If is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of objects returned will not be constrained by workflow ; in other words, a object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of .
